statements: SELECT * FROM ShippingCosts WHERE shipment_id = 1001;
SELECT shipment_id, cost FROM ShippingCosts WHERE shipping_method = 'Air';
SELECT * FROM ShippingCosts WHERE distance < 100;
SELECT shipping_method, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM ShippingCosts GROUP BY shipping_method;
SELECT * FROM ShippingCosts ORDER BY cost DESC, weight ASC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingCosts WHERE weight > 100 AND distance < 500 ORDER BY shipment_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT shipment_id, cost FROM ShippingCosts WHERE cost BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY shipment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingCosts WHERE shipping_method LIKE '%air%' AND cost > 75 ORDER BY distance, cost DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, weight, cost FROM ShippingCosts WHERE weight < 50 OR distance > 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipping_method FROM ShippingCosts WHERE shipping_method IN ('air', 'sea') ORDER BY shipment_id, distance DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM shipping_costs;
SELECT id, destination, distance FROM shipping_costs WHERE weight > 5;
SELECT destination, shipping_method, weight FROM shipping_costs WHERE distance > 1000 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT id, destination, shipping_method FROM shipping_costs WHERE weight < 10 AND distance < 500;
SELECT * FROM shipping_costs WHERE shipping_method = 'Express' ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_costs WHERE weight > 10 AND distance < 100
SELECT destination, shipping_method FROM shipping_costs ORDER BY destination DESC
SELECT weight, distance, rate FROM shipping_costs JOIN shipping_rates ON shipping_costs.weight = shipping_rates.weight_range AND shipping_costs.distance = shipping_rates.distance_range
SELECT * FROM shipping_costs WHERE destination = 'New York' AND shipping_method = 'Express'
SELECT destination, COUNT(*) AS count_shipments FROM shipping_costs GROUP BY destination HAVING count_shipments > 3
SELECT * FROM shipping_costs;
SELECT item_name, weight FROM shipping_costs WHERE weight > 5;
SELECT id, from_location, rate FROM shipping_rates ORDER BY rate DESC;
SELECT to_location, rate FROM shipping_rates WHERE from_location='New York';
SELECT item_id, shipping_date, shipping_cost FROM shipping_history WHERE shipping_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shipping_costs WHERE weight > 5.0 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, destination FROM shipping_costs WHERE destination = 'USA' ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipping_costs WHERE weight BETWEEN 3.0 AND 7.0 ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT item_name, weight, destination FROM shipping_costs WHERE item_name LIKE 'b%' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT sh.item_id, sc.item_name, sh.shipping_date FROM shipping_history sh JOIN shipping_costs sc ON sh.item_id = sc.id ORDER BY sh.shipping_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingCosts;
SELECT id, package_weight, shipping_type FROM ShippingCosts WHERE package_weight > 10;
SELECT id, rate FROM ShippingRates WHERE rate < 5.00;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM ShippingLocations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, shipping_date, cost FROM ShippingHistory ORDER BY shipping_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingCosts;
SELECT id, package_weight FROM ShippingCosts ORDER BY package_weight DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM ShippingLocations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT sh.id, sh.shipping_type, sr.rate FROM ShippingHistory sh LEFT JOIN ShippingRates sr ON sh.shipping_type = sr.shipping_type;

SELECT sh.shipping_date, sc.package_weight, sl.city FROM ShippingHistory sh JOIN ShippingCosts sc ON sh.package_id = sc.id JOIN ShippingLocations sl ON sh.location_id = sl.id WHERE sc.package_weight > 10;
SELECT * FROM shipping_costs LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, cost FROM shipping_costs WHERE weight > 10 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT destination, cost FROM shipping_costs WHERE shipping_method = 'Express' ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM customers WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT item_name, price, description FROM items WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price;
SELECT item_name, weight, destination, cost FROM shipping_costs WHERE destination='New York' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM customers WHERE state='California' ORDER BY zip_code ASC;
SELECT order_date, customer_id, item_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, description, price FROM items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT method_name, estimated_delivery_time FROM shipping_methods WHERE method_name='Express Shipping';
